Plot: One of three films made by Columbia circa 1936-37 based on behind-the-scenes film making with a "western" setting ("The Cowboy Star", "Hollywood Round-up" and "It Happened in Hollywood"), ...
Title: Hollywood Round-Up
Writer: Joseph Hoffman (story), Ethel La Blanche (dialogue), Monroe Shaff (story)
Actors: Buck Jones, Helen Twelvetrees, Grant Withers, Shemp Howard
